desc: Your AI assistant for smart, multilingual, smooth, and personalized decision-making
how_desc: e-META uses a smart form, Make and WhatsApp to generate personalized summaries.
free_desc: A basic version is free. Advanced options will be proposed later.
about_desc: e-META is designed as a decision-support tool using GPT-4, WhatsApp, and guided forms to help users clarify their choices in all areas.
